text: Dangerous Business is a 1920 American silent comedy film directed by Roy William Neill and starring Constance Talmadge, Kenneth Harlan, and George Fawcett.Goble p. 60 ==Cast== * Constance Talmadge as Nancy Flavelle * Kenneth Harlan as Clarence Brooks * George Fawcett as Mr. Flavell * Mathilde Brundage as Mrs. Flavell * John Raymond as Mr. Braille * Florida Kingsley as Mrs. Brooks * Nina Cassavant as Genevieve ==Preservation== There are no listings of Dangerous Business in any film archives,Library of Congress American Silent Feature Film Survival Database: Dangerous Business making it a lost film. ==References== ==Bibliography== * Goble, Alan. The Complete Index to Literary Sources in Film. Walter de Gruyter, 1999. ==External links== * * Category:1920 films Category:1920 comedy films Category:American films Category:American comedy films Category:Films directed by Roy William Neill Category:American silent feature films Category:English-language films Category:American black- and-white films Category:First National Pictures films Category:Lost American films Category:1920 lost films
title: Dangerous Business (1920 film)
